com.google.code.siren4j.component.builder
Class BaseBuilder<T>

java.lang.Object
  com.google.code.siren4j.component.builder.BaseBuilder<T>
Type Parameters:
T -
Direct Known Subclasses:
ActionBuilder, EntityBuilder, FieldBuilder, LinkBuilder
public abstract class BaseBuilder<T>
extends Object

All Siren4J components should be derived from the BaseBuilder class. This class contains the functionality needed for builders to easily add steps, validation and then to actually build the desired component.

Field Detail

steps

protected List<com.google.code.siren4j.component.builder.BaseBuilder.Step> steps
Constructor Detail

BaseBuilder

public BaseBuilder()
Method Detail

build

public T build()
Iterates through all of the build steps and uses reflection call the specified method on either the builder itself or the component being built. Also calls postProcess(Object) and then validate(Object).

Returns:
the newly built component instance, never null.

postProcess

protected void postProcess(T obj)
A subclass can post process the component instance after built by the base but before it is returned by build(). Commonly used if the builder is adding something to the component as it will typically maintain the list itself and then add the values in postProcess(Object).

Parameters:
obj - the newly created component object instance, cannot be null. the component object, never null.

validate

protected void validate(T obj)
Allows validation to occur on the built component object instance. This is called after the object is built and after postProcess(Object) is called but before the component is returned by build().

Parameters:
obj - obj the newly created component object instance, cannot be null. the component object, never null.

createInstance

protected abstract T createInstance()
The subclass must implement this method and return an instance of the component type specified by the return type.

Returns:
never null.

addStep

protected void addStep(String methodName,
                       Object[] args,
                       Class<?>[] argTypes)
Adds a builder step for this builder, upon build these steps will be called in the same order they came in on.

Parameters:
methodName - cannot be null or empty.
args - may be null or empty.

addStep

protected void addStep(String methodName,
                       Object[] args,
                       Class<?>[] argTypes,
                       boolean builderMethod)
Adds a builder step for this builder, upon build these steps will be called in the same order they came in on.

Parameters:
methodName - cannot be null or empty.
args - may be null or empty.
argTypes - argument class types can be specified to ensure the right class types are used when we try to find the specified method. This is needed for primitive types do to autoboxing issues. May be null or empty.
builderMethod - if true then call the specified method on the builder and not the component object instance.

addStep

protected void addStep(String methodName,
                       Object[] args)
Adds a builder step for this builder, upon build these steps will be called in the same order they came in on.

Parameters:
methodName - cannot be null or empty.
args - may be null or empty.

addStep

protected void addStep(String methodName,
                       Object[] args,
                       boolean builderMethod)
Adds a builder step for this builder, upon build these steps will be called in the same order they came in on.

Parameters:
methodName - cannot be null or empty.
args - may be null or empty.
builderMethod - if true then call the specified method on the builder and not the component object instance.
